trans-unit.source: AWS access key ID. If not provided, the default credential chain will be used.
trans-unit.target: AWS access key ID. If not provided, the default credential chain will be used.

trans-unit.source: Path to the certificate file (PEM or DER format) that corresponds to the KMS key.
trans-unit.target: Path to the certificate file (PEM or DER format) that corresponds to the KMS key.

trans-unit.source: Sign files using a key stored in AWS Key Management Service (KMS).
trans-unit.target: Sign files using a key stored in AWS Key Management Service (KMS).

trans-unit.source: The AWS KMS key ID, key ARN, alias name, or alias ARN.
trans-unit.target: The AWS KMS key ID, key ARN, alias name, or alias ARN.

trans-unit.source: AWS profile name from the credentials file. If not provided, the default credential chain will be used.
trans-unit.target: AWS profile name from the credentials file. If not provided, the default credential chain will be used.

trans-unit.source: The AWS region where the KMS key is located (e.g., us-east-1).
trans-unit.target: The AWS region where the KMS key is located (e.g., us-east-1).

trans-unit.source: AWS secret access key. Must be provided with --aws-access-key-id.
trans-unit.target: AWS secret access key. Must be provided with --aws-access-key-id.

trans-unit.source: AWS session token for temporary credentials.
trans-unit.target: AWS session token for temporary credentials.
